subpanels.description: Habitus of Tedania (Tedania) ignis (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1864) shown in RMNH Por. 6308. The scale bar is 1 cm.
Scanning electron microscope (SEM) image of the spicule style of Tedania (Tedania) ignis (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1864).
Detailed SEM image of the spicule style of Tedania (Tedania) ignis (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1864).
SEM image of the microspined tylote spicule of Tedania (Tedania) ignis (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1864).
Detailed SEM image of the microspined tylote spicule of Tedania (Tedania) ignis (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1864).
SEM image of the long onychaete spicule of Tedania (Tedania) ignis (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1864).
Detailed SEM image of the long onychaete spicule of Tedania (Tedania) ignis (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1864).
SEM image of the short onychaete spicule of Tedania (Tedania) ignis (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1864).
Enlarged SEM image of the short onychaete spicule of Tedania (Tedania) ignis (Duchassaing & Michelotti, 1864).
